artist: Artist: Frank Gaard , et al., artists; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 16 pages; saddle-stapled; b/w covers; black-and-white publication with "Artpolice International" across the top; image has Native Americans and one voyager at LR and Franciscan figure in center with arms raised, holding cross in PL hand and reaching toward giant turtle surrounded by Indian headdress feathers; some inside pages are cover image from other issues (?); two color card 4 x 6 in. inserts; one b/w photocopy (?), 8-7/16 x 11 in. insert
title: Artpolice International
